name: Serpent3D
description:
Serpent3D is a simple tech demo of a 3D snake-type game, created in 3 days using Godot 4.

Steer the serpent left and right, and eat as many apples as you can without crashing into the walls or yourself! You have a jump ability which can be used to jump over your own body to get out of a tight situation. Go for a high score!

Controls

ActionKeyboardControllerSteer Left/RightA/D or Left/Right arrow keyLeft control stickJumpSpacebarBottom face button (X on PlayStation, A on Xbox)Start Game/RetryEnterStart
